entry.name: Skykick_Alerts
entry.wildcardgroovyscript:
<# .NOTES Author: Andy Escolastico #> #----------------------------------------------------------[Declarations]----------------------------------------------------------#
$User = "##skykick.user##" $Pass = "##skykick.pass##"
#-----------------------------------------------------------[Functions]------------------------------------------------------------#
(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/skykick-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression
(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/general-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression
#-----------------------------------------------------------[Execution]------------------------------------------------------------#
# Ignores invalid certificate errors Skip-InvalidCertErrors
$Alerts = Get-SkykickAlerts -User $User -Key $Pass | Where-Object {$_.status -eq 'Active'}
#-----------------------------------------------------------[LogicMonitor Output]------------------------------------------------------------#
# Discovery Output foreach ($i in $Alerts){ Write-Output "$($i.alertid)##$($i.subject)##$($i.customername)####auto.skykick.customername=$($i.customername)&auto.skykick.category=$($i.category)&auto.skykick.subcategory=$($i.subcategory)&auto.skykick.descriptionhtml=$($i.descriptionhtml)&auto.skykick.created=$($i.created)&auto.skykick.backupserviceid=$($i.backupserviceid)&auto.skykick.orderid=$($i.orderid)&auto.skykick.workitemid=$($i.workitemid)&auto.skykick.customername=$($i.customername)&auto.skykick.workitemtype=$($i.workitemtype)&auto.skykick.partnerid=$($i.partnerid)&auto.skykick.type=$($i.type)" }
entry.adlist:
{"agdmethod":"ilp","method":"ad_script","agdparams":"auto.skykick.customername","id":0,"filters":[],"params":{"type":"powerShell","groovyscript":"<#
.NOTES
 Author: Andy Escolastico
#>
#----------------------------------------------------------[Declarations]----------------------------------------------------------#

$User = "##skykick.user##"
$Pass = "##skykick.pass##"

#-----------------------------------------------------------[Functions]------------------------------------------------------------#

(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/skykick-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression

(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/general-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression

#-----------------------------------------------------------[Execution]------------------------------------------------------------#

# Ignores invalid certificate errors
Skip-InvalidCertErrors

$Alerts = Get-SkykickAlerts -User $User -Key $Pass | Where-Object {$_.status -eq 'Active'}

#-----------------------------------------------------------[LogicMonitor Output]------------------------------------------------------------#

# Discovery Output
foreach ($i in $Alerts){
 Write-Output "$($i.alertid)##$($i.subject)##$($i.customername)####auto.skykick.customername=$($i.customername)&auto.skykick.category=$($i.category)&auto.skykick.subcategory=$($i.subcategory)&auto.skykick.descriptionhtml=$($i.descriptionhtml)&auto.skykick.created=$($i.created)&auto.skykick.backupserviceid=$($i.backupserviceid)&auto.skykick.orderid=$($i.orderid)&auto.skykick.workitemid=$($i.workitemid)&auto.skykick.customername=$($i.customername)&auto.skykick.workitemtype=$($i.workitemtype)&auto.skykick.partnerid=$($i.partnerid)&auto.skykick.type=$($i.type)"
}"}}

attribute.name: scriptgroovy
attribute.value:
<# .NOTES Author: Andy Escolastico #> #----------------------------------------------------------[Declarations]----------------------------------------------------------#
$User = "##skykick.user##" $Pass = "##skykick.pass##" $Subscription = '##WILDVALUE##'
#-----------------------------------------------------------[Functions]------------------------------------------------------------#
(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/skykick-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression
(new-object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RFAInc/rfa-backups/main/general-functions.ps1') | Invoke-Expression
#-----------------------------------------------------------[Execution]------------------------------------------------------------#
# Ignores invalid certificate errors Skip-InvalidCertErrors
#-----------------------------------------------------------[LogicMonitor Output]------------------------------------------------------------#
#Collection Output
